# Ignore 'Releases' directory (it contains output logs only)
(?:^|/)Releases/
(?:^|/).github/actions/spelling

# Files containing hashes
^\Qcloud-tool/hashes.txt\E$

# Binary files
^\Qdeploy/metadata/128.png\E$
^\Qdeploy/metadata/64.png\E$
^\Qdeploy/metadata/build-info.png\E$
^\Qdeploy/metadata/com.openwall.John.png\E$
^\Qdeploy/metadata/help.png\E$
^\Qdocs/deployment.png\E$
^\QIDE/Debugging-JtR-Using-IDE.png\E$
^\QIDE/OpenCL-JtR-detection.png\E$
^\Qtests/CI-workflow.pdf\E$
